summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5528 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 3, Admiralty Heights Addition, being the alley between Campbell Place Southwest and Admiral Way, from West Lander Street to the production northwesterly of the southwesterly line of the alley in said block established by Ordinance No. 58860; and the alley in said block established by Ordinance No. 58860; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 70824, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
